name: Your House?
description:
Story:

Having just returned home from a long day at work, you were hoping for a good night's sleep, however, things turn gnarly. You cannot escape or do anything but obey 'them'. This is just the beginning.

How To Install:
  1. Download the Game from Itch
  2. Extract the .zip file (once downloaded)
  3. Run: Your House The Horror Game Show.exe
Trigger Warnings:
  • This game contains very loud noises. [The game provides complete control over the audio.]
  • This game contains many flashing lights that may not be suitable for everyone.
  • This game contains visual effects that may cause motion sickness in some people.
Controls: W Walk Forward A Walk Left S Walk Backwards D Walk Right F Flash (Light Source) E Interact (Open Doors) Shift Run (Works When Necessary) Escape Pause / Settings Menu Mouse Look Around / Close Valves

My first ever full-featured horror game has been released! You can comment below or post YouTube videos of the game to support me. I would be very happy to see your reactions! Thanks a lot, and have fun! :)
